title: A Kindred Problem
body:
Just noticed that, if an enemy camp is marked by Kindred and you attack it but one of your mates finishes it off, you wont get a stack. While I think this is good for minor camps, blue and red buffs should work as dragon and baron (Kindred has to participate to the kill, but not necessarily give the killing blow).

What if the enemy blue buff is marked and I want to give it to my mid? I have to decide whether to get a stack of my passive (which is crucial for Kindred) or help my team... I don't think this choice should be made.

replies.body:
Who gives their mid blue, wtf?

Anyways, that decision is easy if it's enemy blue take it (deny the enemy jg) same with red

baron and dragon on the other hand, she shouldn't have to finish it off to get the stack (i agree on this point)

Mmm... not sure whether I was clear. 
What happened in game was that I already had blue and my mark was on the enemy's blue. I went there with my mid and let it give it the final blow, but not received the mark.

I don't think it's fair, when Ivern gets two buff, for Kindred to have to monopolize buffs that can be used for the team
jungler who realize they have mana hungry mid laners such as anivia, thats when blue is given lol, and usually need to be premade to communicate this awesome teamworkiness
